name: Research Team
description: Research, analyze, and synthesize information into insights

project.name: Market Research Analysis
project.description: Demo project for research team workflow

tasks.title: Research competitor features
tasks.description: Identify top 5 competitors in project management space. List their key features, pricing, and unique selling points.

tasks.title: Analyze user feedback data
tasks.description: Analyze collected user feedback to identify patterns, common pain points, and feature requests. Prioritize by frequency and impact.

tasks.title: Create executive summary report
tasks.description: Synthesize research and analysis findings into executive summary with key insights and actionable recommendations.
